content: विचि {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To collect, gather, bring together, store up; <ls>Pt. 1. 45</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 1.">36.</ls> {@--2@} To search for, look out for; विचितश्चैष समंतात् श्मशानवाटः <ls>Māl. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 23</ls>; प्रियतमां विचिन्वन् <ls>V. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To seek, investigate, examine, reflect upon; <ls>R. 10. 23</ls>; <ls>Ki. 16. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To separate, discern, distinguish. {@--5@} To disarrange. {@--6@} To select, choose. {@--7@} To destroy, efface. {@--8@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To clear, prepare (as a way).
